title: the mentally challenged simulator
body:
This does not apply to those who are ambidexterous, you don't matter In this.

We do things with our dominant hand all the time... and on occasion we will use our non dominant and feel a bit stupid... to feel full on mentally challenged though happens when you try to brush your teeth fast with your non-dominant hand. 

There are other examples like writing, but I don't think anyone, for any reason, has brushed their teeth with their non-dominant hand.

Inb4 fancy spinbrushes.. again, you don't matter
